thread.title: Joyleen Sutcliffe
thread.title_full: KISA Phone reviewed by Joyleen Sutcliffe

author: Joyleen Sutcliffe
title: Joyleen Sutcliffe
text: I purchased this phone for my husband and the idea is brilliant as long as he remembers when pressing a button, to wait for the indications (sounds) that the call has gone through or ensuring the same when he hangs up. Especially don't turn the "off" button on the back.
